title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Enhance Contact Center AI With Salesforce and AWS (DAT207)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Salesforce 和 AWS 增强联络中心 AI (DAT207)
abstract: Empower your service reps with a unified, AI-powered workspace and seamless voice and digital interactions with Salesforce Contact Center and Amazon Connect. This presentation is brought to you by Salesforce, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 通过Salesforce联络中心和Amazon Connect，为您的服务代表提供统一的AI驱动工作空间以及无缝的语音和数字交互体验。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Salesforce为您呈现。
